alert.note: Alert for Blanco; Gillespie (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 05 at 4:56PM CDT until May 05 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: The National Weather Service in Austin San Antonio has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Blanco County in south central Texas... Southeastern Gillespie County in south central Texas... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 456 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Willow City, or 13 miles northeast of Fredericksburg, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fredericksburg, Round Mountain, Johnson City, Stonewall, Blowout, Luckenbach, Cain City, Sandy, Willow City, Rocky Hill, LBJ State Park, Rocky Creek, Hye, Cypress Mill, Blumenthal, Eckert, Pedernales Falls State Park, Albert and LBJ National Historical Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CDT for south central Texas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
